Blue Dragon Scale Mail

armor (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 220
armor id [armor]: 36 (Dragon Scale Mail)
protection, body [protbody]: 16
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 1
resist cold [coldres]: +15
morale bonus [morale]: +4

Requires 10W to forge (W2)

Armor made from the scales of a true dragon, it is almost weightless and very durable. It protects its wearer from cold.
